intro: Chrestienia elegans, commonly known as the elegant heather, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Ericaceae family, which includes heathers and blueberries. The plant is characterized by its compact, evergreen foliage and clusters of small, bell-shaped flowers that range in color from white to pink. It thrives in well-drained, acidic soils and prefers full sun to partial shade. Chrestienia elegans is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and as a decorative plant in containers.
